title: Alcenat on Haitian Revolution - historical context

content.question: Which of the following claims can be made regarding the forms of resistance demonstrated by enslaved people in the United States?

choices.label: Violent resistance was effective when enslaved people worked together to plan large rebellions.
Resistance efforts by enslaved people were strongly inspired by patriotic belief in American ideals of freedom.
Resistance most commonly took the form of breaking tools, slowing work, or trying to run away.
Resistance efforts were discouraged by abolitionists due to their low success rate.

content.answer: Resistance most commonly took the form of breaking tools, slowing work, or trying to run away.
